Currently, there are 1000 open referenda, with 60% successfully executed and 27.1% rejected. Voter turnout remains exceptionally low, averaging just 2.49% and a median of 1.99%, indicating a significant disconnect between proposals and participation.  Average participation is 292 individuals per referendum, taking an average of 20.33 days to resolve. Monthly counts show a fluctuating trend, with a recent uptick (July 2024 at 107) following a period of lower activity.
